name: My Christmas Surprise - Hidden Object
description:
My Christmas Surprise is amazing Hidden Object Game For Kids and and adults.

Find the hidden items from the scene and completed each and every levels within time.

Solve this mystery with your brain.

Features:
=======
-> No Ads.
-> All levels are free.
-> Hints help to find the hidden items from the scene.
-> HD stunning location.

It's amazing game play and solve now......
